Action.AddIRCMessage: Are you guys finished?.
I finished time ago.
Yeah was pretty eassy.
Well, was that a nice warmup @#PLAYERNAME#?.
I've been exploring those computers and I can't believe John Peace is providing all the corps with his model.
Wait, what?.
So, these guys are not stealing Aegis equipment, but they're provided by it's creator himself?.
That's what it seems :/.
Darnit, this isn't good, 0 good..
I know, but that's what is our goal now, we need to keep doing what we do, until we find some clues about John Peace's plans cause this is iffy af.
Gotcha, okay guys let's go back to work.
If you guys feel trapped or lost, you can come to the IRC to clear your doubts.
@Kaisa, @Kwiper and @#PLAYERNAME#, I've uploaded more tasks, let's get this thing done.
User @Spiderbenb is joining...
Woah, I'm finally in, that was a long wait though.
Yeah... About that I'm sorry, it was long task for @#PLAYERNAME#.
No probs :p.
Anyway Paulline though you guys needed help and that's why I'm here.
She told me about the deal with John and the VR Sets, and honestly once she told me that I had no choice but to join and help you guys stop that bastard.
And how the hell we are supposed to do that? We don't know anything bout him, not even a single IP.

I know, I know, it's going to be hard but apparently we're going in the right way, what do I mean? Raising Sun and maybe more corps are connected to him since they want only one thing, yes, the VR SET Source Code, John is not giving the S.C but his giving a sample set so corps can easily re-configure it.
So he doesn't want to show the Source Code for some reason right?.
I don't know about you guys but, if he's hiding something like that, it means something dangerous, and I'm pretty sure the hacker, is involved.
The hacker? what do you mean?
Years ago, there was a hacker that broke into some politicians pacemakers and stopped them working, the reason is still unknown but that person now works for John.
Yeah, she's weird, we still don't know why she did that, but we won't let that frighten us right? Guys, I've joined you to help, and that's what I wanna do, no matter what.
Spider is right, I have an idea... Let's make a decoy server.
What do you mean?.
I'll make a node which disguises as a AEGIS one, this will contain a fake source code, and I'll publish it using a VPN, a real strong one.
Sounds like a plan, then what?

Well, corps will get into this server and will download the IP, so I'm going to track them and see if they're related to AEGIS, once I've digged enough I'll give you guys each one a corp for you to explore in okay? We're five people so this work may be easy and fast anyway.
Nice, I'll be waiting.
By the way @#PLAYERNAME#, I need you to help me with something before we find out about the corps related to AEGIS, I've uploaded a mission for you to the hub.
Well, ladies and gentlemen... I've been making the server and so far we baited exactly 4 IPs
That's a lot o:
Well yeah, I only got the IP's, they're encrypted tho, I'm gonna need an application for that and I'm not sure where exactly I can get it.
I know exactly the place, but it's a pain in the ass to get the file.
It's from a friend, but he's not giving anything to me or us, we gotta earn it.
How exactly?
Simple as reaching his computer and getting the file directly from him.
It doesn't sound that complicated.
I know, I know, but that's the point, it looks easy but he's riddly as fuck. Most probably thing is that the files are hidden somewhere.
This brings me memories from Aegis @#PLAYERNAME#.
Riddles.
Not sure though... I have the IP of one of his nodes, that may work?
Pretty sure that will do.
Okay give me a sec...
There we go, it's 96.36.56.14, you should get in and find a way to get a decypher tool.
Okay guys, let's do it.
Oh and by the way, if you get the Decypher remember to upload it to the Drop Server.
I'm gonna take a copy of that...
Done, guys the Decypher.exe is on the dropserver, thank #PLAYERNAME# for that.
So I'm running the Decypher aaad...
Fuck! The file is encrypted with a password
Wasn't your program the one encrypting em? Why did you program add passwords anyway
It didn't, the IP's themselves are encrypted twice the first lock is opened but the second one requires a password
Anyway I've stored the encrypted files in my backup server just in case. Also there you'll find my new program called DECHEAD.exe which tracks the IP of where the file was encrypted.
Use it to find the password for your assigned file.
!ANNOUNCEMENT! - @channel
This is really important... I dont think we need these IP's anymore...
What is it? What happened @Paulline.
As @#PLAYERNAME# was tracking the file, we found what we wanted... One of the persons to enter the Decoy Server was a member of Aegis... and we got everything we want.
How?
I'll link you the info.
Oh wow, this is a lot of info we can use agains't them.
How "much".
Lots @Kaisa, lots, actually we have enough information to go to their core server again and finish it once and for all.
Is not that simple @Spiderbenb, they may find out at some point.
We gotta take advantage of this now.
Before it is too late-1010100000100101
!ANNOUNCEMENT! - @channel
What the hell? What the hell just happened @#PLAYERNAME#.
What happened?
The virus... Attacked #PLAYERNAME#, thankfully #PLAYERNAME# could beat it...
Guys... This virus, these files, these plans for Aegis... Is not something small they're gonna do... It's something really big.
How big?
It envolves every human being on planet earth.
Peace will use the A.I with the source code of the Vr-Set to make a killing bot for the users of a Vr-Set.
What the hell does that guy wants... Why is he so twisted.
I'm not sure... But whatever he wants, it has to be for power, that's the only logical reason he wants to rule having a killing machine loose doing stuff for him.
Is there a way to stop it?
If everything was different... If we... Nevermind, it's to late.
Spit it.
When #PLAYERNAME# corrupted the Core Server time ago, they released the virus, and with that this happened.

Apparently the virus that attacked #PLAYERNAME# is one of the many John has, but he still manages the original source code of the virus, if we could just avoided releasing the virus that time... Everything could have been different.
What about the program you were working on? The 4WSequencer? What does it do?
Oh, that garbage? it doesn't work... It never worked... The language is too complex for me to understand and probably will never find a way to make it run.
What do we do now? @channel
I'm afraid I don't know...
Without a way to get back, we're fucked...
Is alright... It has been a pleasure working with you guys... I think it's time for you all to disconnect. !ATTACHMENT:link#%#Disconnect_Node#%#123.123
See you here in real life.
